fullText:
Alert: Suspicious PowerShell Command Line

EDR telemetry:
- Parent process: WINWORD.EXE
- Command line: powershell.exe -enc <redacted>
- User: CORP\jdoe
- MITRE: T1059 PowerShell

Raw JSON payload omitted for brevity.

Detected PowerShell WebClient DownloadFile to https://example-bad-domain[.]com from DC01.

User: CORP\jdoe

HTTP headers and payload recorded in EDR telemetry.

Multiple authentication failures from IP 203.0.113.10 (Country X) against HR-USER-12.

Geo profile: Country X not seen in last 90 days for this user or peer group.

Source: VPN gateway logs normalized in SIEM.

rule: Inbound Email with Suspicious MFA Link
fullText:
EmailSubject: 'Action Required: Confirm Your MFA Settings'

Links redirect through multiple URL shorteners to a fake O365 login page.

Detection engine score: 95/100 (phishing).

Click telemetry indicates that four users followed the phishing link within 5 minutes of delivery.

No MFA prompt observed downstream; credential theft suspected.
